properties.title: Rütihof Forest Rope Garden
properties.abstract: Cross wobbly rope bridges, glide through the tops of trees on the taught rope and climb up high using ingenious rope ladders. The first forest rope garden in the Aargau region is a challenge to all the senses: excitement and thrills included!
properties.description:
Go climbing, balancing and coordinating, swinging and leaping high up in the air. Experience a day of sporting activity and excitement in the forest. Whether on the sparrow trail, the blackbird trail, the Milantour, the falcon trail or the eagle trail in the forest rope garden, there's a course to suit every level of difficulty. From children from the age of four up to senior citizens with a head for heights, everyone is welcome here. No special previous knowledge is required, just a willingness, team spirit and love of nature.

Enjoy a varied outdoor adventure in the Rütihof forest rope garden in Gränichen.
properties.name: Aargau Tourismus AG
